# Get a message with a number of rows in a data frame of interest

This function admits 1 parameter: 
- `df` Dataframe.
It returns a message in the console
 
  
```{r example-get_df_nrows}
get_df_nrows(df = iris)
get_df_nrows(df = mtcars)
```
